infoitem.subject: YaBB SE 1.3 is out
infoitem.author: Joseph Fung
infoitem.details: The latest version of YaBB SE is available for download. Get it now!

infoitem.subject: YaBB SE Registration

infoitem.details: Don't forget to register your YaBB SE installation! Read more about why you should register at the above link.
